title: T206 SGC Authentic Lot - Waddell, SL - SOLD!
author: t206hound

posts.post_title: T206 SGC Authentic Lot - Waddell, SL - SOLD!
posts.post_content:
Recently back from SGC, all six are trimmed.  Cards have great eye appeal and have no creases.  Asking $225 delivered.  Standard paypal payment preferred.

Click on the player name for large scan:
[URL="http://gallery.me.com/kimsummers/100091/124A/web.jpg"]Jim Delehanty[/URL]
[URL="http://gallery.me.com/kimsummers/100091/291A/web.jpg"]Harry Lumley[/URL]
[URL="http://gallery.me.com/kimsummers/100091/405A/web.jpg"]Ed Reagan[/URL]
[URL="http://gallery.me.com/kimsummers/100091/414A/web.jpg"]Ike Rockenfeld[/URL]
[URL="http://gallery.me.com/kimsummers/100091/474A/web.jpg"]Bill Sweeney[/URL]
[URL="http://gallery.me.com/kimsummers/100091/494A/web.jpg"]Rube Waddell (Throwing)[/URL]

Or you can look at [URL="http://gallery.me.com/kimsummers#100091&view=grid&bgcolor=black&sel=5"]the entire gallery[/URL]

Hey Erick,

I'll take them.  PM sent.
